website_summaries.verdict: A perfectly adequate netbook for most office work or studying. A great value for the money.
pros: Android operating system interfaces effortlessly with Google’s suite of apps
Very lightweight, with a thin profile
Handles basic browsing and light office work very well
cons: Resolution is too low to comfortably see many websites
Streaming video will tax the processor despite its 4 GB of RAM

customer_reviews.title: What you always wanted a computer to be like
customer_reviews.text: If I knew something could just work like I always expected it to; fast as all get out, nothing running in the background, battery lasting for what feel like forever, I would have got one of these a long time ago. I always wanted a laptop that was ready to go a second after lifting the lid. Now I do. This thing is a no brainer. Absolutely love this.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R.

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to use. Doesn't use Microsoft office but spreadsheets work well and I have office on another computer. Well worth price.
customer_reviews.author: grannygrace

customer_reviews.title: lightweight dream!
customer_reviews.text: this little guy was bought out of love of travel and small things. after having terrible luck with laptops traveling, we needed something reliable to track bills, payments, bank accounts and emails with. this does the trick! light weight, easy access, no frills. i can check facebook but cant play games, can check email but cant watch youtube. basically like a big fancy tablet, which is good cause my husband has trouble seeing the small text on the phone and on tablets.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Facepunch

customer_reviews.title: a bit disappointed as it cant do as a regular pc
customer_reviews.text: a bit disappointed as it cant do as a regular pc. it plays my vacation videos but no sound. file sharing doesnt work and it cant use windows apps or android apps. Its good for facebook games,,,but if you want to use messenger calling you have to be on facebook as theres no messenger that works on this machine outside of facebook. the built in webcam is only good on facebook also as the app for it doesnt work
customer_reviews.author: steve kintz

customer_reviews.title: awesome laptop for surfing the web
customer_reviews.text: awesome laptop for surfing the web. Pretty much setup right out of the box. Connect it to your internet, login or create an account and you are off ready to go. surfing the web in less than 10 minutes after opening the box. Just comes with computer and power plug.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby B.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Dropping Internet Connection
customer_reviews.text: Chromebook keeps dropping internet connection which is frustrating because internet browsing is all this device is designed to do. I assume support is aware of an issue because they didn't even troubleshoot and immediately asked me to send it in to HP for service. I'll re-review once service is completed.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B Reese

customer_reviews.title: Got a lemon,lucky me
customer_reviews.text: It is a lemon,had it sent back to be fixed once,lasted 10 days now getting the run around to send it in again. So unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: DobieMom

customer_reviews.title: super long battery life (binge-watchers friend)
customer_reviews.text: Really quick, super long battery life (binge-watchers friend), wish it had more storage though - tempted to give it a 5 star and would do so (despite the storage space, which hasn't even been a problem for me yet) if it was ever so slightly cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting & affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Long term review (2+ years) this little chrome book is perfect for those who need a mobile laptop that isn’t a huge risk in the case of theft. It’s been running just like it was on day one for years now, being used nearly every single day. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: HP - Bad repair service - never buy HP again.
customer_reviews.text: I got this chromebook for my son. The chromebook was broken less than a year. The damage is not covered by warranty. HP asked me to pay about the same amount as I spent to buy a new chromebook. Bad customer service and bad repair strategy. I won't buy HP products forever.
customer_reviews.author: little mommy - E

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: In general, I love Chromebooks, but this one is very slow. I should have paid more an bought one that could keep up with internet speeds. I'm literally typing and having to wait a couple seconds for the text to catch up. I feel like I'm in 1997.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Gray

customer_reviews.title: which I love!! If you are looking to just surf ...
customer_reviews.text: As I write this review on my Chromebook...which I love!! If you are looking to just surf the world wide wed or stream Black Mirror on Netflix, this is the laptop to do it with. Easy to use, and not to mention if your a Google user, all things Google at your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J Kafka

customer_reviews.title: ... for my daughter and was pleasantly surprised with how nice it is
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and was pleasantly surprised with how nice it is. It is pretty fast for how affordable it is. Good screen quality, does everything she needs.
customer_reviews.author: devin

customer_reviews.title: Very simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very simple and easy to use. The only thing I would complain about is that the main screen doesnt show anywhere to go to the specs of the computer. So I cant figure out what type of programs are on here already. But, it was cheap and simple and is easy to use for what I need. Cant complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua tovar

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my older parents to use as their only computer. Well-made and good performance.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A.

customer_reviews.title: so-so
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it for long and it's very slow and randomly shuts down. It's also more of a bummer than I thought it would be to only be able to work online. I ended up buying another computer.
customer_reviews.author: jlc

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I receive this laptop it was still enrolled to a school and all the restrictions was turn off so I had to send it back could not reset it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much just an internet machine
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much just an internet machine, very basic but does what it does perfectly and I have dropped it at least 5 times off my bed at night and it's still kicking. Indestructible? For the money, you probably can't do better.
customer_reviews.author: James C Lescott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this fastm tiny, light, just what I Needed for travel
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA RABY

customer_reviews.title: Crashed after only 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Hello. I only use this laptop occasionally for Netflix or email. After only 4 months months it has completely crashed. I can see that it is on by lights but screen is completely black. It happened out if the blue. Working in evening, next morning it would not come up. It was not dropped, or wet or placed in heat. This is not acceptable after only 4 months of infrequent use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... elderly mom so she could do very important things like check Facebook
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my elderly mom so she could do very important things like check Facebook. She loves it. Pretty easy to use overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pieces of technology for surfing the internet. Comes aon fast and has a great keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: oldkiter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 of these for a family of 6. Their life expectancy is about 2.5 years.
customer_reviews.author: J. hain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son-in-law and he absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: No Microsoft updates!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband, who loves it so far
customer_reviews.author: Sara Scott

customer_reviews.title: QualityQ and value
customer_reviews.text: long lasting, extremely reliable, great value and quality for browsing and video chat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. On as soon as you open it. Disadvantage-less apps
customer_reviews.author: william mullen

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast and meets expectations. Everything we need is through the browser so did everything we need it to. Still need to figure out how to print from it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. Third Chromebook we've purchased, and are always a great value & product
customer_reviews.author: CSC1101

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter, she love this chromebook. Batterry life is good too. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Gagandeep Sidhu

customer_reviews.title: Decent budget laptop option
customer_reviews.text: I've been rather unimpressed by this product, which is a direct consequence of its budget price point. This is by no means a powerful laptop, one with a pretty screen, or anything of the sort. Instead, it's a well polished Chromebook, a market of laptops that are so cheap you'll wonder how they make any money. My two main disappointments include the screen, which is washed out and grainy, in addition to the slow hard drive. An SSD would have gone a long way toward making this a better (albeit more expensive) product. Unfortunately, it's unbearably slow. Coming from a Macbook Air I can't help but feel like I made a mistake buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan L.

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T WORK - Straight out of box
customer_reviews.text: On the phone with Amazon right now, waiting to get refund and return label. Opened the box last night to make sure it was good to go for Christmas and the only thing that appears is a blue screen with lines in it. I would expect that an item like this would be checked before sending. Dead out of the box is ridiculous! Best Buy will be getting my money today.
customer_reviews.author: JMTB

customer_reviews.title: I am done purchasing anything made by HP.
customer_reviews.text: I am done w/HP products, nothing is designed to last beyond 2 years, and I've bought from the highest end to the cheaper. I bought this to hold me over while I await repair on my very high end HP desktop (that died conveniently right outside its warranty date), and not wanting to spend a lot of money, and only needing to read email's and do research on the internet, this piece if crap died after only 6 WEEKS. Not only that, it is a practically impossible feat just to get your printer set-up to print. I gave up, and then the laptop did. I would give 0 stars if I could, good-by HP.
customer_reviews.author: lauranyc

customer_reviews.title: they really like it.
customer_reviews.text: It was for my granddaughters and so far, they really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice laptop
customer_reviews.text: It was everything I’ve expected. Just need to be updated when you first get it, but I’m glad I found this great deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Nice value. Just what we needed for our afterschool program. Items came as advertised and arrived in a very timely manner. Quick ship.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Prows

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: This product is not the best. The battery does not last very long, it is ok i guess for the price but could be better.
customer_reviews.author: breanna H.

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for the price. I gave it 4 stars only because you can't download music from this laptop using Chrome. Other then that I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, easily converted to Linux
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any use for Chrome OS but this is a very nice laptop, easily converted to Linux by switching to GalliumOS, a flavor of Ubuntu optimized for converted Chromebooks: it is lightweight and low profile, boots very fast and has a long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... to do school work on and he is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 15 yr old son to do school work on and he is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Patti B.

customer_reviews.title: not bad for surfing the web etc
customer_reviews.text: It was okay but now exactly what I wanted . I am in the process of purchasing another laptop with more storage and better resolution. I feel that this is perfect for a student or someone who only wants to check their email and surf the web occasionally. I would definitely recommend it for that.
customer_reviews.author: rosemarie

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is more than I could ever have ...
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is more than I could ever have expected at this price. Fast startup, bright clear display, tactical full size keyboard. Very well constructed. The only issue was that the product arrived in a plain box. Chrome book and power supply ... not an HP box. Just a plain brown box with foam padding. That surprised. me. But the device works.
customer_reviews.author: smolander

customer_reviews.title: Good For School Kids
customer_reviews.text: We got.this for our granddaughter because it is the exact same computer she uses in her second grade class. She is comfortable with it because she has the same computer both at home and school. The only thing I noticed is it doesn't support some of the apps that I can download on my regular PC. She can't download Minecraft (a game), for instance. I wouldn't have chosen this computer, but she is very happy with it. I have yet to determine whether I can download Microsoft Office on it or not. But all in all, this was perfect for the needs of our grandchild at this stage in her life.
customer_reviews.author: laura k.

customer_reviews.title: magnificent computer
customer_reviews.text: I haven't plugged it in yet. I have the old version of it, with the same specifications and it has served me perfectly well for 3 years. The new one is thinner and even more beautiful. I bought it as a spare. For around $240 dollars, it is an incredible value worth 4 times what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: jeff in new england

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love! Purchased for my 10 year old who ises Chrome books at school and is having more and more online homework. He uses it everyday and loves it! Fires up fast like an ipad, you can create slide shows and word documents for school through google docs and beat of all like tablets it updates itself and has built in security. We have been very happy.
customer_reviews.author: MRen4+2

customer_reviews.title: This laptop had been perfect for her
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my wife. She runs a small business and uses all cloud based tools. This laptop had been perfect for her. Light weight and long battery life with plenty of power for her day to day needs. It had some issues when zooming in with the track pad, only issue so far. Excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Did not Hold up
customer_reviews.text: screen went black and cannot see what is on it . Gave as a Christmas gift. It died 3 months from turning it on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little laptop. Bought for someone else, but ti serves its purpose wonderfully. There is, however, a learning curve for navigating through this version. When did they stop giving manuals with technology?
customer_reviews.author: Ramspak

customer_reviews.title: Excellent solution for numerous areas of struggle
customer_reviews.text: Excellent solution for numerous areas of struggle. Product was delivered in a very timely manner, payment was processed as quickly as possible. Quality of the Chromebooks are excellent, no question there.
customer_reviews.author: CC Sysadmin

customer_reviews.title: I like how it physically looks and feels
customer_reviews.text: Got it to try something different from Windows. I like how it physically looks and feels. But i don't like the OS. Its not terrible, but its not that good either. Needless to say, i'm switching back to Windows after this one
customer_reviews.author: Neil Felix

customer_reviews.title: Overall, lightning fast and exceptional online abilities.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical since this chromebook operates with its own OS, which I didn't fully comprehend the gravity of till I tried to download or add on some laptop necessities like Microsoft Office, etc. There are a lot of users that have recommended applications free of charge, but for the cost, graphics, weight, and most importantly, speed... this chromebook exceeds my expectations. Well worth the cost. The battery lasts me about 12 hours unplugged. I typically run 6-8 tabs online, and am constantly streaming music from YouTube, since it's only downside (as many others agree) it doesn't have a sufficient/capable MP3 player/music playing ability -yet. But I'm typically optimistic. (Still worth the cost).
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Loewinsohn

customer_reviews.title: Returned Acer for this... glad I did.....
customer_reviews.text: Bought acer what a mistake. If you need warranty wk like i did you need to pack it up and pay shipping both ways. I returned it and vought this. Much nicer but just a bit slower then the acer 15 but thats ok. I would buy anything but a acer and this one worked out great for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Fighton1959

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: exactly as described, fast shipping, just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa Scammell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works just fine. I only am sending it back because it is not Windows ten compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Karleigh

customer_reviews.title: It works great.
customer_reviews.text: FAST! Now if only my mom could get used to using the internet based system; I bought it as a present for her when her old HP was just falling apart. BUY this. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Wainwright

customer_reviews.title: how i have to change it very quickly?
customer_reviews.text: I really don't like it.I was try to change it.but it said needs long time for change. that's why I was stopped. but I am not gonna use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ahasanul

customer_reviews.title: He is happy with it and it has all the features he ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to use at school. He is happy with it and it has all the features he needs.
customer_reviews.author: Purplecv

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Don't even bother buying this turd. Got mine and it was slow right out of the box, and I had the damn thing freeze and completely shut down on me once.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Harper

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: just dont like that i cant download certain things like autoclicker ect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The memory was too small, only 4G so I ...
customer_reviews.text: The memory was too small, only 4G so I had to return it back and get something with bigger memory.
customer_reviews.author: A B

customer_reviews.title: Get some interesting games, Dammit!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Chromebook, love the simplicity and the clean uncluttered operation of it. My fingers love to scroll - mouselessly. I love everything about my Chromebook - except the lack of games. Why can't mighty Google Chrome get some good adult word games like Scrabble or board games like Yahtzee or Arcade games or Bicycle solitaire games?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is OK
customer_reviews.text: Very different than a regular computer but also less expensive .
customer_reviews.author: Lutzelberger
